artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Engraver: Thérèse Chenu
description: bust portrait of an old man(?) wearing a turban; white shirt with high gathered neck; turned slight right; in an oval
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate on oval in black: Rembrandt | below image in black: Rembrandt pinx. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain | at top right: 83 | on sheet in pencil: 2-275
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 83
title: Print
